content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the relationship of ideas such as those in the excerpt to the broader Progressive reform movement of the era?

choices.label: The ideas in the excerpt were adopted widely by Progressive reformers as worthy objectives.
Progressive presidents supported the ideas in the excerpt while social reformers tended to reject them.
State laws addressing Progressive reform issues tended to incorporate ideas like those in the excerpt.
The ideas in the excerpt challenged the racial stereotypes held by many White Progressive reformers.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
